Sentencas: The multi-energy system that contains the highly coupled energy supply equipment units can be adopted to simultaneously satisfy the cooling, heating and electrical energy demands.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: Owing to the complex nature of multiple supplies and demands, an integrated demand and supply side management strategy was proposed for aligning the system operation and building energy demands.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: The proposed strategy included three core algorithms: demand side rolling optimization, supply side rolling optimization and feedback correction.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: Demand and supply side rolling optimizations were simultaneously implemented to determine the schedulable appliances and operating capacities of energy supply equipment units over the next 24-h planning horizon.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: Feedback correction was involved for continual modification on any discrepancy between various actual and predicted energy demands.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: In this study, a trigeneration system primed with solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine was designed as the multi-energy system to serve a high-rise apartment building with electric cars.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: It was found that the primary energy consumption, the design capacity of the prime mover and the capacity of electricity storage would be decreased by 8.75%, 10% and 43% respectively through the integrated demand and supply side management strategy.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application

Sentencas: It was also noted that electric cars played important roles in effective demand side management.
Titulo: Development of integrated demand and supply side management strategy of multi-energy system for residential building application
